items.title: Sentenced to Be a Hero
items.description: In a world where heroism is a punishment, Xylo Forbartz, a condemned goddess killer, battles endless hordes of monstrous abominations as part of Penal Hero Unit 9004. Death is no escape, only a cycle of resurrection and relentless combat. But when Xylo encounters a mysterious new goddess, their unlikely alliance sparks a rebellion that could shatter the chains of eternal punishment.

items.title: The Pendragon Cycle: Rise of the Merlin
items.description: Merlin, the immortal son of the bard Taliesin and Atlantean Princess Charis, is followed through his tragic upbringing, descent into madness, and shocking disappearance, leading to the legend that surrounds him. Set before King Arthur's birth, Merlin, assumed dead or a myth, reemerges in sub-Roman Britain to unite the fractured kingdoms under threat from Saxon invaders.

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
items.description: Frodo Baggins and the other members of the Fellowship continue on their sacred quest to destroy the One Ring--but on separate paths. Their destinies lie at two towers--Orthanc Tower in Isengard, where the corrupt wizard Saruman awaits, and Sauron's fortress at Barad-dur, deep within the dark lands of Mordor. Frodo and Sam are trekking to Mordor to destroy the One Ring of Power while Gimli, Legolas and Aragorn search for the orc-captured Merry and Pippin. All along, nefarious wizard Saruman awaits the Fellowship members at the Orthanc Tower in Isengard.

items.title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
items.description: A century before the events of Game of Thrones, two unlikely heroes wandered Westeros: a young, naive but courageous knight, Ser Duncan the Tall, and his diminutive squire, Egg. Set in an age when the Targaryen line still holds the Iron Throne and the last dragon has not yet passed from living memory, great destinies, powerful foes, and dangerous exploits await these improbable and incomparable friends.

items.title: Steal
items.description: A typical day at Lochmill Capital is upended when armed thieves burst in and force Zara and her best friend Luke to execute their demands. In the aftermath, conflicted detective Rhys races against time to find out who stole £4 billion pounds of people's pensions and why.

items.title: Shelter
items.description: A man living in self-imposed exile on a remote island rescues a young girl from a violent storm, setting off a chain of events that forces him out of seclusion to protect her from enemies tied to his past.

items.title: 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple
items.description: Dr. Kelson finds himself in a shocking new relationship - with consequences that could change the world as they know it - and Spike's encounter with Jimmy Crystal becomes a nightmare he can't escape.

items.title: Dracula
items.description: When a 15th-century prince denounces God after the devastating loss of his wife, he inherits an eternal curse: he becomes Dracula. Condemned to wander the centuries, he defies fate and death itself, guided by a single hope — to be reunited with his lost love.

items.title: Wonder Man
items.description: Simon and Trevor, two actors at opposite ends of their careers, chase life-changing roles.

items.title: Mercy
items.description: In the near future, a detective stands on trial accused of murdering his wife. He has ninety minutes to prove his innocence to the advanced AI Judge he once championed, before it determines his fate.

items.title: Send Help
items.description: Two colleagues become stranded on a deserted island, the only survivors of a plane crash. On the island, they must overcome past grievances and work together to survive, but ultimately, it's a battle of wills and wits to make it out alive.

items.title: Greenland 2: Migration
items.description: Having found the safety of the Greenland bunker after the comet Clarke decimated the Earth, the Garrity family must now risk everything to embark on a perilous journey across the wasteland of Europe to find a new home.

items.title: Primate
items.description: Lucy, a college student, along with her friends, spend their vacation at her family's home in Hawaii, which includes her pet chimpanzee, Ben. However, when Ben contracts rabies after being bitten by a rabid animal, the group must fight for their lives in order to avoid the now-violent chimp.

items.title: The Wrecking Crew
items.description: Estranged half-brothers Jonny and James reunite after their father's mysterious death. As they search for the truth, buried secrets reveal a conspiracy threatening to tear their family apart.

items.title: Return to Silent Hill
items.description: When James receives a mysterious letter from his lost love Mary, he is drawn to Silent Hill—a once-familiar town now consumed by darkness. As he searches for her, James faces monstrous creatures and unravels a terrifying truth that will push him to the edge of his sanity.

items.title: "Wuthering Heights"
items.description: Tragedy strikes when Heathcliff falls in love with Catherine Earnshaw, a woman from a wealthy family in 18th-century England.

items.title: GOAT
items.description: Will, a small goat with big dreams, gets a once-in-a-lifetime shot to join the pros and play roarball – a high-intensity, co-ed, full-contact sport dominated by the fastest, fiercest animals in the world. Will's new teammates aren't thrilled about having a little goat on their roster, but Will is determined to revolutionize the sport and prove once and for all that 'smalls can ball'! He has to do something he has never done before.

items.title: Iron Lung
items.description: The stars are gone. The planets have disappeared. Only individuals aboard space stations or starships were left to give the end a name - The Quiet Rapture. After decades of decay and crumbling infrastructure, the Consolidation of Iron has made a discovery on a barren moon designated AT-5. An ocean of blood. Hoping to discover desperately needed resources they immediately launch an expedition. A submarine is crafted and a convict is welded inside. Due to the pressure and depth of the ocean the forward viewport has been encased in metal. If successful, they will earn their freedom. If not, another will follow. This will be the 13th expedition.

items.title: The Voice of Hind Rajab
items.description: January 29, 2024. Red Crescent volunteers receive an emergency call. A five-year old girl is trapped in a car under fire in Gaza, pleading for rescue. While trying to keep her on the line, they do everything they can to get an ambulance to her. Her name was Hind Rajab.

items.title: Call Me Mother
items.description: Twinkle is a single queer mother whose dream of officially adopting her son gets shaken when the boy's biological mother, Mara, unexpectedly reappears.

items.title: Father Mother Sister Brother
items.description: Three stories concerning the relationships between adult children, their somewhat distant parent (or parents), and each other: a reclusive father visited by his grown children in the US, sisters visiting their novelist mother in Dublin, and adult twins called back to their Paris apartment to address a family tragedy.

items.title: The Choral
items.description: As World War I rages on, Dr. Henry Guthrie takes over a British choral society that's lost most of its men to the army. The community soon discovers that the best response to the chaos of war is to make beautiful music together.

items.title: Cold Storage
items.description: When a mutating, highly contagious fungus escapes a sealed facility, two young employees – joined by a grizzled bioterror operative – must survive the wildest night shift ever to save humanity from extinction.

items.title: Scream 7
items.description: When a new Ghostface killer emerges in the quiet town where Sidney Prescott has built a new life, her darkest fears are realized as her daughter becomes the next target. Determined to protect her family, Sidney must face the horrors of her past to put an end to the bloodshed once and for all.

items.title: Kokuho
items.description: Nagasaki, 1964: Following the death of his yakuza father, 15-year-old Kikuo is taken under the wing of a famous kabuki actor. Alongside Shunsuke, the actor’s only son, he decides to dedicate himself to this traditional form of theatre. For decades, the two young men grow and evolve together – and one will become the greatest Japanese master of the art of kabuki.

items.title: Melania
items.description: Offering unprecedented access to the 20 days leading up to the 2025 Presidential Inauguration — through the eyes of the First Lady-elect herself — step inside Melania Trump's world as she orchestrates inauguration plans, navigates the complexities of the White House transition, and reenters public life with her family. With exclusive footage capturing critical meetings, private conversations, and never-before-seen environments, Mrs. Trump returns to one of the world's most powerful roles.

items.title: Crime 101
items.description: When an elusive thief whose high-stakes heists unfold along the iconic 101 freeway in Los Angeles eyes the score of a lifetime, with hopes of this being his final job, his path collides with a disillusioned insurance broker who is facing her own crossroads, forcing the two to collaborate. Determined to crack the case, a relentless detective closes in on the operation, raising the stakes even higher.

items.title: The Well
items.description: In a world where environmental collapse has left survivors to fight for the precious resources needed to survive, a young woman’s loyalties are tested by the arrival of a wounded man. When he discovers her family has a secret supply of fresh water it puts them all in the crosshairs of a dangerous cult, and their ruthless leader Gabriel.

items.title: We Bury the Dead
items.description: After a catastrophic military disaster, the dead don't just rise—they hunt. The military insists they are harmless and slow-moving, offering hope to grieving families. But when Ava enters a quarantine zone searching for her missing husband, she uncovers the horrifying truth: the undead are growing more violent, more relentless, and more dangerous with every passing hour.

items.title: Whistle
items.description: When a group of misfit teenagers stumble upon an ancient Aztec death whistle, they learn that by blowing it, its terrifying sound will invoke their future deaths to hunt them down. As the body count rises, the friends investigate the origins of the deadly artifact in a desperate effort to stop the horrifying chain of events that they've set in motion.

items.title: Nirvanna the Band the Show the Movie
items.description: When their plan to book a show at the Rivoli goes horribly wrong, Matt and Jay accidentally travel back to the year 2008.

items.title: Lupin the IIIRD: The Movie - The Immortal Bloodline
items.description: After fending off a series of skilled assassins, gentleman thief Lupin III and his band of allies follow a strange invitation to an uncharted island. When their plane is shot down, the gang is stranded and soon hunted by the island’s inhabitants, past enemies, and a monstrous immortal being known as Muom, who threatens to destroy Lupin's legacy. As a deadly toxic fog settles over them, Lupin must confront his greatest enemy in his most daring escapade yet.

items.title: Unexpected Family
items.description: For family reasons, Zhong Bufan, a young man from a small town, flees his home to try to reach Beijing. On the way, he crosses paths with Ren Jiqing, an old man suffering from Alzheimer's disease who mistakes him for his son.

items.title: Rosemead
items.description: In a race against time, an ailing woman discovers her teenage son's violent obsessions and must go to great lengths to protect him, and possibly others, in this portrait of a Chinese American family. Inspired by true events.

items.title: The Chronology of Water
items.description: Growing up in an environment torn apart by violence and alcohol, a young woman finds her voice through the written word and her salvation as a swimmer.

items.title: The Stranger
items.description: In 1930s Algeria, the daily life of an indifferent Frenchman is shaken by the death of his mother and a fateful encounter on a beach.

items.title: Dead Man's Wire
items.description: In 1977, former real estate developer Tony Kiritsis puts a dead man's switch on himself and the mortgage banker who did him wrong, demanding $5 million and a personal apology.

items.title: Islands
items.description: In this twisty thriller, a tennis coach at a tropical resort finds himself at the center of a missing persons mystery. Tom teaches tennis during the day and parties at night. When an enigmatic tourist arrives, Tom is unable to shake the feeling he has met her before. Tension and attraction grow, until her husband disappears, and the police suspect Tom.

items.title: Zombie Land Saga: Yumeginga Paradise
items.description: Zombies × Idols × Saga — Seriously!? What kind of madness will this outrageous, expectation-defying anime unleash on the big screen!? Legendary girls return as zombies to fight as Saga's local idols in the groundbreaking zombie-idol anime, “ZOMBIE LAND SAGA.” With outrageous zombie antics, unexpectedly moving moments, and music that transcends the idol genre, the series became an instant sensation, spanning its production over two TV anime seasons. And now, their stage expands to the movie theater — everything is packed into this ultimate entertainment experience!!!!!!! The unprecedented Galaxy Festival Movie begins now!!

items.title: How to Make a Killing
items.description: Disowned at birth by his obscenely wealthy family, blue-collar Becket Redfellow will stop at nothing to reclaim his inheritance, no matter how many relatives stand in his way.

items.title: Busted Water Pipes
items.description: A crime-fighting cop maintains a zero-crime rate and faces job loss, so he decides to fabricate a major case, unaware that actual grave robbers are targeting a treasure-filled tomb located directly beneath his police station.

items.title: Honey Bunch
items.description: Diana's husband is taking her to an experimental trauma facility deep in the wilderness, but she can't remember why... As her memories begin to creep back in so do some unwelcome sinister truths about her marriage.

items.title: Follies
items.description: François and Julie, together for 16 years and parents of two children, can no longer connect intimately. They decide to open up their relationship in order to engage in sexual follies that will allow them to learn more about themselves.

items.title: My Father's Shadow
items.description: Two young brothers explore Lagos with their estranged father during the 1993 Nigerian election crisis, witnessing both the city's magnitude and their father's daily struggles as political unrest threatens their journey home.

items.title: ALL YOU NEED IS KILL
items.description: When a massive alien flower known as "Darol" unexpectedly erupts in a deadly event, unleashing monstrous creatures that decimate the population of Japan, Rita is caught in the destruction—and killed. But then she wakes up again. And again. Caught in an endless time loop, Rita must navigate the trauma and repetition of death until she crosses paths with Keiji, a shy young man trapped in the same cycle. Together, they fight to break free from the loop and find meaning in the chaos around them.

items.title: The Richest Woman in the World
items.description: An elderly billionaire woman gives hundreds of millions of euros to a younger gay artist she is close to. Her daughter files a complaint for abuse of a vulnerable person and a scandal erupts.

items.title: The Moment
items.description: A rising pop sensation navigates fame and industry pressures while preparing for her arena tour debut, revealing the transformation of underground culture into mainstream success.

items.title: EPiC: Elvis Presley in Concert
items.description: A mix of a documentary and concert film made using unused footage from Elvis: That's the Way It Is, the film of Elvis' legendary 1970 Summer Festival in Las Vegas and Elvis's road concert film from two years later, Elvis on Tour, that were found during the production of 2022's Elvis.

items.title: Charlie the Wonderdog
items.description: Timid nine year old Danny teams up with his beloved family dog Charlie, who gets abducted by aliens and returns with superpowers, to thwart a plan by the neighbor's sinister cat Puddy to destroy humanity.

items.title: Two Sleepy People
items.description: Two Sleepy People is a story about two coworkers who, after taking a new line of melatonin gummies, are trapped in the same dream every night.

items.title: Hot & New This Week
items.description: Featured trailer — new this week.

items.title: Iron Lung
items.description: Based on the cult classic indie game, a prisoner is sent into an ocean of blood on a desolate moon in a leaky submarine.

items.title: Shelter
items.description: A survival thriller following a family trapped in an underground bunker as the world above collapses.

items.title: Send Help
items.description: A group of friends on a remote island find themselves hunted by an unknown entity after sending a distress signal.

items.title: 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple
items.description: The latest chapter in the post-apocalyptic saga, exploring a new community's struggle for survival.

items.title: Zootopia 2
items.description: Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde return for a new mystery in the sprawling city of Zootopia.

items.title: Marty Supreme
items.description: A biographical drama about the life and career of a legendary ping-pong player.

items.title: The Housemaid
items.description: A psychological thriller about a housemaid who becomes entangled in the secrets of the wealthy family she works for.

items.title: Mercy
items.description: A sci-fi action thriller about a detective who discovers a conspiracy involving advanced technology.

items.title: Return to Silent Hill
items.description: A man returns to the mysterious town of Silent Hill to find his missing love.

items.title: Charlie the Wonderdog
items.description: A family comedy about a heroic dog who becomes a local sensation after saving a group of children.

items.title: Dead Man's Wire
items.description: A crime thriller about a heist gone wrong and the deadly consequences that follow.

items.title: Hamnet
items.description: A historical drama about the short life of William Shakespeare's only son, Hamnet, and the impact of his death on his parents.

items.title: Song Sung Blue
items.description: A biographical musical drama about a couple who form a Neil Diamond tribute band.

items.title: The Testament of Ann Lee
items.description: A historical drama exploring the life and spiritual journey of the founder of the Shakers.

items.title: Wicked: For Good
items.description: A documentary or special screening related to the making of the Wicked movies.

items.title: Dracula
items.description: Luc Besson's take on the classic vampire tale, focusing on the dark and tragic origins of the count.

items.title: The Strangers: Chapter 3
items.description: The terrifying conclusion to the trilogy, as the masked killers face off against their survivors.

items.title: Clika
items.description: A drama exploring the lives of a group of teenagers navigating the complexities of modern social circles.

items.title: Primate
items.description: A sci-fi thriller about a breakthrough in primate intelligence that leads to unintended consequences.

items.title: Project Hail Mary
items.description: Based on Andy Weir's novel, an astronaut wakes up alone on a spaceship with no memory of his mission to save Earth.

items.title: Toy Story 5
items.description: Woody, Buzz, and the gang return for a new adventure involving a high-tech smart tablet.

items.title: Shrek 5
items.description: The beloved green ogre returns with Donkey and Fiona in a highly anticipated new chapter.

items.title: Avengers: Doomsday
items.description: The Avengers must assemble once again to face a threat that endangers the entire multiverse.

items.title: The Batman Part II
items.description: The sequel to Matt Reeves' The Batman, continuing the crime saga in Gotham City.

items.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
items.description: James Cameron's next chapter in the Avatar saga. The Na'vi face new threats as the RDA returns with devastating force.

items.title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie
items.description: Mario and friends embark on a cosmic adventure in Illumination's next Nintendo adaptation.

items.title: Scream 7
items.description: Neve Campbell and Courteney Cox return in the next chapter of the iconic horror franchise.

items.title: The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping
items.description: A prequel exploring the 50th Hunger Games and the story of Haymitch Abernathy.

items.title: The Odyssey
items.description: Christopher Nolan's epic adaptation of Homer's Odyssey starring Matt Damon.

items.title: The Devil Wears Prada 2
items.description: Miranda Priestly returns in this sequel to the beloved 2006 film.

items.title: Masters of the Universe
items.description: Nicholas Galitzine stars as He-Man in this epic fantasy adventure.

items.title: Wuthering Heights
items.description: Margot Robbie and Jacob Elordi star in this adaptation of the classic novel.

items.title: The Mandalorian and Grogu
items.description: The Mandalorian and Grogu's story continues on the big screen.

items.title: Spider-Man 4
items.description: Tom Holland returns as Spider-Man in his next solo adventure.

items.title: The Pitt
items.description: The staff of Pittsburgh's Trauma Medical Center work around the clock to save lives in an overcrowded and underfunded emergency department.

items.title: David
items.description: From the songs of his mother’s heart to the whispers of a faithful God, David’s story begins in quiet devotion. When the giant Goliath rises to terrorize a nation, a young shepherd armed with only a sling, a few stones, and unshakable faith steps forward. Pursued by power and driven by purpose, his journey tests the limits of loyalty, love, and courage—culminating in a battle not just for a crown, but for the soul of a kingdom.

items.title: Marty Supreme
items.description: Marty Mauser, a young man with a dream no one respects, goes to hell and back in pursuit of greatness.

items.title: Hamnet
items.description: The powerful story of love and loss that inspired the creation of Shakespeare's timeless masterpiece, Hamlet.

items.title: Rental Family
items.description: An American actor in Tokyo struggles to find purpose until he lands an unusual gig: working for a Japanese 'rental family' agency, playing stand-in roles for strangers. As he immerses himself in his clients' worlds, he begins to form genuine bonds that blur the lines between performance and reality.

items.title: The Secret Agent
items.description: Brazil, 1977. Marcelo, a technology expert in his early 40s, is on the run. Hoping to reunite with his son, he travels to Recife during Carnival but soon realizes that the city is not the safe haven he was expecting.

items.title: No Other Choice
items.description: After being laid off and humiliated by a ruthless job market, a veteran paper mill manager descends into violence in a desperate bid to reclaim his dignity.

items.title: Zootopia 2
items.description: After cracking the biggest case in Zootopia's history, rookie cops Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde find themselves on the twisting trail of a great mystery when Gary De'Snake arrives and turns the animal metropolis upside down. To crack the case, Judy and Nick must go undercover to unexpected new parts of town, where their growing partnership is tested like never before.

items.title: Sentimental Value
items.description: Sisters Nora and Agnes reunite with their estranged father, the charismatic Gustav, a once-renowned director who offers stage actress Nora a role in what he hopes will be his comeback film. When Nora turns it down, she soon discovers he has given her part to an eager young Hollywood star.

items.title: The Day the Earth Blew Up: A Looney Tunes Movie
items.description: Porky and Daffy, the classic animated odd couple, turn into unlikely heroes when their antics at the local bubble gum factory uncover a secret alien mind control plot. Against all odds, the two are determined to save their town (and the world!)...that is if they don't drive each other crazy in the process.

items.title: Sinners
items.description: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

items.title: Song Sung Blue
items.description: Based on a true story, two down-on-their-luck musicians form a joyous Neil Diamond tribute band, proving it's never too late to find love and follow your dreams.

items.title: One Battle After Another
items.description: Washed-up revolutionary Bob exists in a state of stoned paranoia, surviving off-grid with his spirited, self-reliant daughter, Willa. When his evil nemesis resurfaces after 16 years and she goes missing, the former radical scrambles to find her, father and daughter both battling the consequences of his past.

items.title: Bugonia
items.description: Two conspiracy obsessed young men kidnap the high-powered CEO of a major company, convinced that she is an alien intent on destroying planet Earth.

items.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
items.description: In the wake of the devastating war against the RDA and the loss of their eldest son, Jake Sully and Neytiri face a new threat on Pandora: the Ash People, a violent and power-hungry Na'vi tribe led by the ruthless Varang. Jake's family must fight for their survival and the future of Pandora in a conflict that pushes them to their emotional and physical limits.

items.title: The Housemaid
items.description: Trying to escape her past, Millie Calloway accepts a job as a live-in housemaid for the wealthy Nina and Andrew Winchester. But what begins as a dream job quickly unravels into something far more dangerous—a sexy, seductive game of secrets, scandal, and power.

items.title: Sirāt
items.description: A man and his son arrive at a rave lost in the mountains of Morocco. They are looking for Marina, their daughter and sister, who disappeared months ago at another rave. Driven by fate, they decide to follow a group of ravers in search of one last party, in hopes Marina will be there.

items.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants
items.description: Desperate to be a big guy, SpongeBob sets out to prove his bravery to Mr. Krabs by following The Flying Dutchman – a mysterious swashbuckling ghost pirate – on a seafaring adventure that takes him to the deepest depths of the deep sea, where no Sponge has gone before.

items.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur
items.description: In a world where he survived the events of Spartacus (2010), Ashur clawed his way to power, owning the same ludus that once owned him. Allying with a fierce gladiatrix, Ashur ignites a new kind of spectacle that offends the elite.

items.title: Anaconda
items.description: A group of friends facing mid-life crises head to the rainforest with the intention of remaking their favorite movie from their youth, only to find themselves in a fight for their lives against natural disasters, giant snakes and violent criminals.

items.title: Silent Night, Deadly Night
items.description: After witnessing his parents' brutal murder on Christmas Eve, Billy transforms into a Killer Santa, delivering a yearly spree of calculated, chilling violence. This year, his blood-soaked mission collides with love, as a young woman challenges him to confront his darkness.

items.title: Ella McCay
items.description: An idealistic young politician juggles familial issues and a challenging work life while preparing to take over the job of her mentor, the state’s longtime incumbent governor.

items.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants
items.description: SpongeBob and his friends embark on an epic quest to find him after he goes missing from Bikini Bottom.

items.title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
items.description: The sequel to the horror hit, bringing more animatronic terror to the big screen.

items.title: Wicked: Part Two
items.description: The conclusion of the epic musical saga starring Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande.

items.title: Lilo & Stitch
items.description: Live-action adaptation of the beloved story about a girl and her blue alien friend.

items.title: Saw XI
items.description: Jigsaw's twisted games continue in the eleventh installment of the horror franchise.

items.title: Jurassic World Rebirth
items.description: A new era for the franchise set years after Dominion, starring Scarlett Johansson.

items.title: M3GAN 2.0
items.description: The killer AI doll returns for even more mayhem in this high-tech horror sequel.

items.title: Snow White
items.description: Rachel Zegler and Gal Gadot star in Disney's live-action reimagining of the classic tale.

items.title: Dog Man
items.description: The popular children's book hero comes to life in this animated action-comedy.

items.title: Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning
items.description: Tom Cruise returns for the final chapter. Ethan Hunt faces his most dangerous mission yet.

items.title: Superman
items.description: James Gunn's take on the Man of Steel. Clark Kent reconciles his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing.

items.title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
items.description: Marvel's First Family arrives. Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, and Ebon Moss-Bachrach star.

items.title: Captain America: Brave New World
items.description: Sam Wilson takes up the shield in an international incident that tests the new Captain America.

items.title: Minecraft
items.description: A young girl and her friends must save the Overworld from the Ender Dragon in the live-action adaptation.

items.title: Mickey 17
items.description: Bong Joon-ho's sci-fi about an expendable colonist who refuses to be replaced by his clone.

items.title: Thunderbolts
items.description: Marvel's anti-hero team assembles for a mission that could change everything.

items.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
items.description: Ethan Hunt faces his most dangerous mission yet.

items.title: 28 Years Later
items.description: The rage virus resurfaces 28 years after the original outbreak.

items.title: Thunderbolts*
items.description: A team of antiheroes is assembled for dangerous missions.

items.title: Ballerina
items.description: A John Wick spinoff following a deadly ballerina assassin.

items.title: The Accountant 2
items.description: Ben Affleck returns as the deadly accountant.

items.title: Karate Kid: Legends
items.description: Jackie Chan and Ralph Macchio team up in this martial arts epic.

items.title: Freakier Friday
items.description: Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan return for another body swap adventure.

items.title: A Minecraft Movie
items.description: A live-action adaptation of the beloved video game.

items.title: Fallout
items.description: The story of haves and have-nots in a world in which there's almost nothing left to have. 200 years after the apocalypse, the gentle denizens of luxury fallout shelters are forced to return to the irradiated hellscape their ancestors left behind — and are shocked to discover an incredibly complex, gleefully weird, and highly violent universe waiting for them.

items.title: Gladiator II
items.description: Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal, and Denzel Washington star in Ridley Scott's epic sequel.

items.title: Wicked
items.description: The untold story of the Wicked Witch of the West and Glinda. Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande star.

items.title: 【OSHI NO KO】
items.description: A small-town doctor gets sucked into the ruthless world of show business when he crosses paths with a popular teen idol who holds a secret.

items.title: The Daily Life of the Immortal King
items.description: As a cultivation genius who has achieved a new realm every two years since he was a year old, Wang Ling is a near-invincible existence with prowess far beyond his control. But now that he’s sixteen, he faces his greatest battle yet – Senior High School. With one challenge after another popping up, his plans for a low-key high school life seem further and further away…

items.title: The Good Doctor
items.description: Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and savant syndrome, relocates from a quiet country life to join a prestigious hospital's surgical unit. Unable to personally connect with those around him, Shaun uses his extraordinary medical gifts to save lives and challenge the skepticism of his colleagues.

items.title: The Night Manager
items.description: Former British soldier Jonathan Pine navigates the shadowy recesses of Whitehall and Washington where an unholy alliance operates between the intelligence community and the secret arms trade. To infiltrate the inner circle of lethal arms dealer Richard Onslow Roper, Pine must himself become a criminal.

items.title: Chicago Med
items.description: An emotional thrill ride through the day-to-day chaos of the city's most explosive hospital and the courageous team of doctors who hold it together. They will tackle unique new cases inspired by topical events, forging fiery relationships in the pulse-pounding pandemonium of the emergency room.

items.title: The Late Show with Stephen Colbert
items.description: Stephen Colbert brings his signature satire and comedy to The Late Show with Stephen Colbert, the #1 show in late night, where he talks with an eclectic mix of guests about what is new and relevant in the worlds of politics, entertainment, business, music, technology, and more. Featuring bandleader Jon Batiste with his band Stay Human, the Emmy Award-nominated show is broadcast from the historic Ed Sullivan Theater.

items.title: Chicago P.D.
items.description: A riveting police drama about the men and women of the Chicago Police Department's District 21 who put it all on the line to serve and protect their community. District 21 is made up of two distinctly different groups: the uniformed cops who patrol the beat and go head-to-head with the city's street crimes and the Intelligence Unit that combats the city's major offenses - organized crime, drug trafficking, high profile murders and beyond.

items.title: Fargo
items.description: A close-knit anthology series dealing with stories involving malice, violence and murder based in and around Minnesota.

items.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
items.description: After Jay Leno's second retirement from the program, Jimmy Fallon stepped in as his permanent replacement. After 42 years in Los Angeles the program was brought back to New York.

items.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
items.description: Seth Meyers, who is "Saturday Night Live's" longest serving anchor on the show's wildly popular "Weekend Update," takes over as host of NBC's "Late Night" — home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent. As the Emmy Award-winning head writer for "SNL," Meyers has established a reputation for sharp wit and perfectly timed comedy, and has gained fame for his spot-on jokes and satire. Meyers takes his departure from "SNL" to his new post at "Late Night," as Jimmy Fallon moves to "The Tonight Show".

items.title: Game of Thrones
items.description: Seven noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros. Friction between the houses leads to full-scale war. All while a very ancient evil awakens in the farthest north. Amidst the war, a neglected military order of misfits, the Night's Watch, is all that stands between the realms of men and icy horrors beyond.

items.title: Death in Paradise
items.description: A brilliant but idiosyncratic British detective and his resourceful local team solve baffling murder mysteries on the fictional Caribbean island of Saint Marie.

items.title: Supernatural
items.description: When they were boys, Sam and Dean Winchester lost their mother to a mysterious and demonic supernatural force. Subsequently, their father raised them to be soldiers. He taught them about the paranormal evil that lives in the dark corners and on the back roads of America ... and he taught them how to kill it. Now, the Winchester brothers crisscross the country in their '67 Chevy Impala, battling every kind of supernatural threat they encounter along the way.

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
items.description: As armies mass for a final battle that will decide the fate of the world--and powerful, ancient forces of Light and Dark compete to determine the outcome--one member of the Fellowship of the Ring is revealed as the noble heir to the throne of the Kings of Men. Yet, the sole hope for triumph over evil lies with a brave hobbit, Frodo, who, accompanied by his loyal friend Sam and the hideous, wretched Gollum, ventures deep into the very dark heart of Mordor on his seemingly impossible quest to destroy the Ring of Power.​

items.title: Mayday
items.description: Major real-life air disasters are depicted in this series. Each episode features a detailed dramatized reconstruction of the incident based on cockpit voice recorders and air traffic control transcripts, as well as eyewitnesses recounts and interviews with aviation experts.

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
items.description: Young hobbit Frodo Baggins, after inheriting a mysterious ring from his uncle Bilbo, must leave his home in order to keep it from falling into the hands of its evil creator. Along the way, a fellowship is formed to protect the ringbearer and make sure that the ring arrives at its final destination: Mt. Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed.

items.title: Midsomer Murders
items.description: The peacefulness of the Midsomer community is shattered by violent crimes, suspects are placed under suspicion, and it is up to a veteran DCI and his young sergeant to calmly and diligently eliminate the innocent and ruthlessly pursue the guilty.

items.title: Friends
items.description: Six young people from New York City, on their own and struggling to survive in the real world, find the companionship, comfort and support they get from each other to be the perfect antidote to the pressures of life.

items.title: Kamen Rider
items.description: Takeshi Hongo is a promising young man with a passion for motorcycle racing. However, his dreams are suddenly ruined when he gets kidnapped by Shocker, the evil secret organization planning to dominate the world. After being remodeled into a cyborg, Takeshi escapes and swears to protect the world from the inhuman monsters.

items.title: Mission: Impossible 8
items.description: Tom Cruise returns as Ethan Hunt in the conclusion of the Dead Reckoning saga.

items.title: Fantastic Four: First Steps
items.description: Marvel's First Family finally arrives in the MCU.

items.title: Predator: Badlands
items.description: A new chapter in the Predator franchise.

items.title: Jurassic World 4
items.description: A new era of dinosaur chaos begins.

items.title: Cosmic Princess Kaguya!
items.description: Iroha's life gets knocked off its orbit when Kaguya, a carefree runaway from the Moon, moves in and convinces her to perform in a virtual world together.

items.title: Memory of a Killer
items.description: Angelo Ledda lives two totally separate lives — fearsome NYC hitman and sleepy upstate Cooperstown photocopier salesman and father. Both of them are threatened when he is diagnosed with Alzheimer's, a disease he already lost his older brother to.

items.title: Finding Her Edge
items.description: A former ice dancer returns to the rink with an exciting new partner while holding onto feelings for her old one — her first love.

items.title: The Rip
items.description: Trust frays when a team of Miami cops discovers millions in cash inside a run-down stash house, calling everyone — and everything — into question.

items.title: The Beauty
items.description: The world of high fashion turns dark when international supermodels begin dying in gruesome and mysterious ways. FBI Agents Cooper Madsen and Jordan Bennett are sent to Paris to uncover the truth. As they delve deeper into the case, they uncover a sexually transmitted virus that transforms ordinary people into visions of physical perfection, but with terrifying consequences.

items.title: Star Trek: Starfleet Academy
items.description: A young group of cadets come together to pursue a common dream of hope and optimism. Under the watchful and demanding eyes of their instructors, they will discover what it takes to become Starfleet officers as they navigate blossoming friendships, explosive rivalries, first loves and a new enemy that threatens both the Academy and the Federation itself.

items.title: From the Ashes: The Pit
items.description: Trapped in an underground pit during a storm, three students from an all-girls school must confront their personal conflicts as they fight to survive.

items.title: Gen V Season 2
items.description: The supers-in-training face new conspiracies and moral dilemmas at Godolkin University.

items.title: Yellowjackets Season 3
items.description: The survival saga returns, uncovering deeper secrets of what happened in the wilderness.

items.title: The Boys Season 5
items.description: The final season of the superhero satire series.

items.title: House of the Dragon Season 3
items.description: The Targaryen civil war continues in this Game of Thrones prequel.

items.title: Hacks Season 4
items.description: Deborah Vance and Ava continue their comedic partnership.

items.title: Euphoria Season 3
items.description: The critically acclaimed teen drama returns.

items.title: The Gilded Age Season 3
items.description: The period drama continues in 1880s New York.

items.title: Ahsoka Season 2
items.description: Ahsoka Tano's search for Grand Admiral Thrawn continues.

items.title: Lanterns
items.description: Kyle Chandler stars as Hal Jordan in this DC series.

items.title: Pluribus
items.description: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.

items.title: F1
items.description: Racing legend Sonny Hayes is coaxed out of retirement to lead a struggling Formula 1 team—and mentor a young hotshot driver—while chasing one more chance at glory.

items.title: Frankenstein
items.description: Dr. Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant but egotistical scientist, brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.

items.title: Train Dreams
items.description: A logger leads a life of quiet grace as he experiences love and loss during an era of monumental change in early 20th-century America.

items.title: The Big Fake
items.description: Toni Chichiarelli arrives in Rome with the dream of becoming a painter, but his talent leads him elsewhere — from art galleries to state secrets. Between art, crime, and power, his signature ends up everywhere — even in the history of Italy.

items.title: Squid Game Season 2
items.description: Player 456 returns to the games with a newfound purpose to dismantle them.

items.title: Wednesday Season 2
items.description: Wednesday Addams returns to Nevermore Academy for more mystery and mayhem.

items.title: The Bear Season 4
items.description: Carmy and the crew continue to navigate the high-pressure world of fine dining.

items.title: Elio
items.description: Pixar's cosmic adventure about a boy who is mistaken for Earth's intergalactic ambassador.

items.title: Daredevil: Born Again
items.description: Matt Murdock returns to fight for justice in Hell's Kitchen in this gritty MCU series.

items.title: Stranger Things Season 5
items.description: The final battle for Hawkins begins as Eleven and her friends face the ultimate evil.

items.title: The White Lotus Season 3
items.description: A new group of wealthy guests stay at a luxury resort in Thailand, where secrets emerge.

items.title: Peacemaker Season 2
items.description: John Cena returns as Christopher Smith, facing new missions and old demons in the DCU.

items.title: Ironheart
items.description: Riri Williams develops her own advanced suits of armor, continuing her journey from Wakanda Forever.

items.title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
items.description: A new Game of Thrones prequel following Ser Duncan the Tall and his squire Egg.

items.title: The Last of Us Season 2
items.description: Joel and Ellie face a violent conflict that threatens Jackson in the adaptation of Part II.

items.title: Severance Season 2
items.description: Mark and the Lumon team return as the mystery of the severed floor deepens.

items.title: Andor Season 2
items.description: The final season leads directly into Rogue One as Cassian becomes a rebel.

items.title: Reacher Season 3
items.description: Jack Reacher faces new dangerous adversaries.

items.title: Foundation Season 3
items.description: Apple TV+'s epic adaptation of Asimov continues as the Foundation and Empire collide.

items.title: Moana 2
items.description: Moana returns to the ocean for a new voyage with Maui and a crew of wayfinders.

items.title: Outer Banks Season 4
items.description: The Pogues return for more treasure hunting and high-stakes adventure.

items.title: The Witcher Season 4
items.description: Liam Hemsworth takes over as Geralt of Rivia.

items.title: The Bride
items.description: A reimagining of Bride of Frankenstein.

items.title: Havoc
items.description: Tom Hardy stars as a detective navigating a criminal conspiracy.

items.title: Arcane Season 2
items.description: The animated League of Legends series continues.

items.title: Shōgun
items.description: In feudal Japan, a mysterious European ship is found in a small fishing village.

items.title: Shogun
items.description: An English sailor becomes embroiled in feudal Japan's political conflicts.

items.title: The Bear Season 3
items.description: Carmy and the crew push the restaurant to new heights in the award-winning drama.

items.title: The Penguin
items.description: Colin Farrell returns as Oz Cobb in this Batman spinoff.

items.title: Dune: Part Two
items.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen on a warpath of revenge.

items.title: Fallout
items.description: In a post-nuclear Los Angeles, a vault dweller must venture into the wasteland.

items.title: Slow Horses Season 4
items.description: The disgraced MI5 agents at Slough House face new dangers.

items.title: Cobra Kai Season 6
items.description: The final season of the Karate Kid sequel series.

items.title: The Wild Robot
items.description: A robot learns to survive in the wilderness and becomes a mother.

items.title: Ripley
items.description: Andrew Scott stars as the charming con man Tom Ripley.

items.title: Silo Season 2
items.description: Juliette continues to uncover the mysteries of the Silo.

items.title: Abbott Elementary Season 4
items.description: The mockumentary follows teachers at an underfunded school.

items.title: Industry Season 3
items.description: The high-finance drama continues at Pierpoint & Co.

items.title: Only Murders in the Building Season 4
items.description: The amateur sleuths investigate a new murder mystery.

items.title: Deadpool & Wolverine
items.description: The Merc with a Mouth teams up with Wolverine in the MCU's R-rated blockbuster.

items.title: Baby Reindeer
items.description: A comedian's life is turned upside down by a stalker.

items.title: High Potential
items.description: Morgan is a single mom with an exceptional mind, whose unconventional knack for solving crimes leads to an unusual and unstoppable partnership with a by-the-book seasoned detective.

items.title: Inside Out 2
items.description: Riley faces new emotions as Anxiety, Envy, Ennui, and Embarrassment join the crew.

items.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
items.description: The origin story of Furiosa in the Wasteland. Anya Taylor-Joy and Chris Hemsworth star.

items.title: 3 Body Problem
items.description: Scientists across the world face an extinction-level threat.

items.title: True Detective: Night Country
items.description: Detectives investigate the disappearance of researchers in Alaska.

items.title: Alien: Romulus
items.description: A group of young space colonizers face the deadliest life form in the universe.

items.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
items.description: Sonic and friends face Shadow the Hedgehog.

items.title: Skeleton Crew
items.description: Four kids lost in a dangerous galaxy try to find their way home.

items.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
items.description: The ghost with the most returns in this sequel to the 1988 classic.

items.title: Dune: Prophecy
items.description: A prequel series exploring the origins of the Bene Gesserit.

items.title: Rings of Power Season 2
items.description: The epic drama set in J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth continues.

items.title: Agatha All Along
items.description: Agatha Harkness assembles a coven to walk the Witches' Road.

items.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
items.description: Experience the day the world went quiet.

items.title: Challengers
items.description: A love triangle between three tennis players over the years. Zendaya stars.

items.title: The Fall Guy
items.description: A stuntman is drawn into a mystery.

items.title: Twisters
items.description: Storm chasers risk their lives to study unprecedented tornado events.

items.title: Civil War
items.description: Journalists document a civil war in a dystopian America.

items.title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
items.description: Many years after Caesar's reign, a new ape leader builds an empire while humans live in the shadows.

items.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
items.description: Godzilla and Kong must unite against a colossal undiscovered threat.

items.title: Monkey Man
items.description: Dev Patel's directorial debut about vengeance.

items.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
items.description: Mike and Marcus are on the run.

items.title: Despicable Me 4
items.description: Gru and the Minions face a new villain in this animated sequel.

items.title: Abigail
items.description: Kidnappers discover their captive is a vampire.

items.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
items.description: Decades after her party defeated the Demon King, an old friend's funeral launches the elf wizard Frieren on a journey of self-discovery.

items.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
items.description: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse and meets a team of Spider-People.

items.title: The Last of Us
items.description: After a pandemic destroys civilization, a survivor escorts a girl who may be humanity's last hope.

items.title: Succession
items.description: The Roy family fights for control of their global media empire.

items.title: Oppenheimer
items.description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and the development of the atomic bomb.

items.title: The Bear Season 2
items.description: Carmy and Sydney work to transform their sandwich shop into a fine dining destination.

items.title: Beef
items.description: A road rage incident between two strangers spirals into a feud that consumes their lives.

items.title: Hell's Paradise
items.description: For a chance at a pardon, a ninja assassin joins other condemned criminals on a journey to a mysterious island to retrieve an elixir of immortality.

items.title: Killers of the Flower Moon
items.description: Martin Scorsese's epic about the Osage murders in 1920s Oklahoma.

items.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
items.description: The Guardians protect one of their own while unraveling Rocket's past.

items.title: Past Lives
items.description: Two childhood friends reunite in New York.

items.title: Poor Things
items.description: Emma Stone stars in this surreal Victorian tale.

items.title: The Holdovers
items.description: A cranky teacher stays with a student over Christmas break.

items.title: Shrinking
items.description: Jimmy is struggling to grieve the loss of his wife while being a dad, friend, and therapist. He decides to try a new approach with everyone in his path: unfiltered, brutal honesty. Will it make things better—or unleash uproarious chaos?

items.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
items.description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating the High Table in the longest chapter yet.

items.title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One
items.description: Ethan Hunt faces a dangerous enemy.

items.title: Hijack
items.description: Expert negotiator Sam Nelson is in for the ride of his life—and so is everyone on board with him—after a group of hijackers take control. Sam will try every move in his playbook to take them down...as the stakes grow higher by the second.

items.title: Drops of God
items.description: While the world of wine mourns the death of Alexandre Léger, his estranged daughter, Camille, learns his extraordinary collection is now hers. But before she can claim her inheritance, Camille must best Alexandre's protégé, Issei, in a test of their senses.

items.title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
items.description: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother Luigi.

items.title: The Color Purple
items.description: Musical adaptation of the beloved story.

items.title: Creed III
items.description: Adonis Creed faces his childhood friend in the ring.

items.title: Barbie
items.description: Barbie suffers a crisis that leads her to the real world. Greta Gerwig's blockbuster.

items.title: Wonka
items.description: The origin story of Willy Wonka.

items.title: Elemental
items.description: In a city where fire, water, land and air residents live together.

items.title: Napoleon
items.description: Ridley Scott's epic about Napoleon Bonaparte.

items.title: Blue Beetle
items.description: A teenager gains superpowers from an alien scarab.

items.title: Anyone But You
items.description: Two people pretend to be a couple at a destination wedding.

items.title: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny
items.description: Indiana Jones races to find a legendary artifact.

items.title: The Marvels
items.description: Captain Marvel, Ms. Marvel, and Monica Rambeau team up.

items.title: The Little Mermaid
items.description: Live-action remake of the Disney classic.

items.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
items.description: Ant-Man and the Wasp explore the Quantum Realm.

items.title: No Hard Feelings
items.description: Jennifer Lawrence stars in this raunchy comedy.

items.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
items.description: Aquaman must forge an uneasy alliance.

items.title: Fast X
items.description: Dom Toretto and his family face a new threat.

items.title: Cocaine Bear
items.description: A bear ingests cocaine and goes on a rampage.

items.title: Wish
items.description: A girl wishes on a star that comes to life.

items.title: Meg 2: The Trench
items.description: Jason Statham battles massive prehistoric sharks.

items.title: House of the Dragon
items.description: The Targaryen dynasty is at the height of its power 200 years before Game of Thrones.

items.title: Top Gun: Maverick
items.description: Maverick trains a detachment of graduates for a specialized mission. Tom Cruise returns.

items.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
items.description: A Chinese-American woman is swept into an adventure where she must connect different lives.

items.title: Wednesday
items.description: Wednesday Addams navigates Nevermore Academy while solving a murder mystery.

items.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
items.description: Puss in Boots discovers he's on his last life.

items.title: The Batman
items.description: Batman investigates Gotham's corruption as the Riddler targets the city's elite.

items.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
items.description: Jake Sully and Neytiri's family face the return of the RDA and a new threat from the sea.

items.title: Elvis
items.description: The life story of rock icon Elvis Presley.

items.title: Bullet Train
items.description: Brad Pitt stars as an assassin on a bullet train.

items.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
items.description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home in the wake of King T'Challa's death.

items.title: Nope
items.description: Jordan Peele's UFO thriller about two siblings who discover something sinister in the sky.

items.title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
items.description: Detective Benoit Blanc investigates a new mystery.

items.title: The Menu
items.description: A couple visits an exclusive restaurant with dark secrets.

items.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
items.description: Doctor Strange travels into the multiverse.

items.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
items.description: The origin story of the Minions and young Gru.

items.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
items.description: Thor teams up with Jane Foster and the Guardians.

items.description: A 1950s housewife uncovers disturbing truths.

items.description: Three friends witness a murder and become suspects.

items.title: Squid Game

items.title: No Way Home
items.description: Spider-Man seeks help from Doctor Strange when his identity is revealed.

items.title: Mare of Easttown
items.description: A detective investigates a murder in Pennsylvania.

items.title: Dune
items.description: Paul Atreides must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to secure his family's future.

items.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
items.description: Peter Parker's identity is revealed and he seeks the help of Doctor Strange to fix it.

items.description: Loki is brought to the mysterious TVA and forced to fix the timeline he broke.

items.description: Wanda and Vision live in sitcom reality.

items.title: Stranger Things

items.title: JUJUTSU KAISEN
items.description: Yuji Itadori is a boy with tremendous physical strength, though he lives a completely ordinary high school life. One day, to save a classmate who has been attacked by curses, he eats the finger of Ryomen Sukuna, taking the curse into his own soul. From then on, he shares one body with Ryomen Sukuna. Guided by the most powerful of sorcerers, Satoru Gojo, Itadori is admitted to Tokyo Jujutsu High School, an organization that fights the curses... and thus begins the heroic tale of a boy who became a curse to exorcise a curse, a life from which he could never turn back.

items.title: The Queen's Gambit
items.description: A chess prodigy rises to the top.

items.title: The Mandalorian
items.description: A lone bounty hunter travels the outer reaches of the galaxy far from the New Republic.

items.title: Bridgerton
items.description: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set in the backdrop of Regency era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

items.title: Soul
items.description: A jazz musician stuck in the Great Before seeks to return to Earth. Pixar's existential hit.

items.title: Tenet
items.description: A secret agent manipulates the flow of time to prevent World War III.

items.title: Onward
items.description: Two elf brothers embark on a magical quest.

items.title: The Invisible Man
items.description: A woman believes her abusive ex has found a way to become invisible. Elisabeth Moss stars.

items.title: Birds of Prey

items.title: Spides
items.description: Young Nora from Berlin wakes up from a coma after taking a new party drug and can no longer remember anything. When investigators find out that numerous teenagers have disappeared as part of the spread of the party drug 'Bliss', Nora begins to investigate. She uncovers an uncanny conspiracy: Aliens use the drug to use the bodies of their victims as hosts.

items.title: Chernobyl

items.title: Joker

items.title: Euphoria
items.description: Teens navigate drugs, love, and identity.
Two soldiers race against time in WWI.

items.title: Ford v Ferrari
items.description: Ford challenges Ferrari at Le Mans 1966.

items.title: The Witcher
items.description: A monster hunter navigates a dangerous world.

items.title: Knives Out
items.description: A detective investigates a patriarch's death.

items.description: Tarantino's tribute to 1969 Hollywood.

items.title: Aladdin
items.description: Live-action remake of the Disney classic.

items.title: Captain Marvel

items.title: The Lion King
items.description: Photorealistic remake of the Disney classic.

items.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
items.description: The game takes the gang to new territories.

items.title: The Rookie
items.description: Starting over isn't easy, especially for small-town guy John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of being an LAPD officer. As the force's oldest rookie, he’s met with skepticism from some higher-ups who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

items.title: Avengers: Infinity War
items.description: The Avengers must stop Thanos from collecting all six Infinity Stones.

Explore the high-pressure experiences of police officers, paramedics and firefighters who are thrust into the most frightening, shocking and heart-stopping situations. These emergency responders must try to balance saving those who are at their most vulnerable with solving the problems in their own lives.

items.title: Killing Eve
items.description: A spy and an assassin become obsessed.

items.title: The Queen of Flow
items.description: After spending seventeen years in prison unfairly, a talented songwriter seeks revenge on the men who sank her and killed her family.

items.title: Black Panther
items.description: T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to take his rightful place as king.

items.title: Dark
items.description: A German sci-fi thriller about time travel.

items.title: Ozark
items.description: A family launders money in the Ozarks.

items.title: Fleabag
items.description: A woman navigates life in London.

items.title: Stranger Things
items.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

items.title: The Crown
items.description: The reign of Queen Elizabeth II.

items.title: Westworld
items.description: Robots in a Wild West theme park gain consciousness.

items.title: Better Call Saul
items.description: The origin of Saul Goodman.

items.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
items.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa.

items.title: Interstellar
items.description: Explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

items.title: The Flash
items.description: After being struck by lightning, CSI investigator Barry Allen awakens from a nine-month coma to discover he has been  granted the gift of super speed.  Teaming up with S.T.A.R. Labs, Barry takes on the persona of The Flash, the Fastest  Man Alive, to protect his city.

items.title: Peaky Blinders
items.description: A Birmingham crime family after WWI.

items.title: The Blacklist
items.description: Raymond "Red" Reddington, one of the FBI's most wanted fugitives, surrenders in person at FBI Headquarters in Washington, D.C. He claims that he and the FBI have the same interests: bringing down dangerous criminals and terrorists. In the last two decades, he's made a list of criminals and terrorists that matter the most but the FBI cannot find because it does not know they exist. Reddington calls this "The Blacklist". Reddington will co-operate, but insists that he will speak only to Elizabeth Keen, a rookie FBI profiler.

items.title: Chicago Fire
items.description: An edge-of-your-seat view into the lives of everyday heroes committed to one of America's noblest professions. For the firefighters, rescue squad and paramedics of Chicago Firehouse 51, no occupation is more stressful or dangerous, yet so rewarding and exhilarating. These courageous men and women are among the elite who forge headfirst into danger when everyone else is running the other way and whose actions make the difference between life and death.

items.title: Shameless
items.description: Chicagoan Frank Gallagher is the proud single dad of six smart, industrious, independent kids, who without him would be... perhaps better off. When Frank's not at the bar spending what little money they have, he's passed out on the floor. But the kids have found ways to grow up in spite of him. They may not be like any family you know, but they make no apologies for being exactly who they are.

items.title: Homeland
items.description: CIA officer Carrie Mathison is tops in her field despite being bipolar, which makes her volatile and unpredictable. With the help of her long-time mentor Saul Berenson, Carrie fearlessly risks everything, including her personal well-being and even sanity, at every turn.

items.title: Modern Family
items.description: The Pritchett-Dunphy-Tucker clan is a wonderfully large and blended family. They give us an honest and often hilarious look into the sometimes warm, sometimes twisted, embrace of the modern family.

items.title: Breaking Bad
items.description: Walter White, a New Mexico chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with Stage III cancer and given a prognosis of only two years left to live. He becomes filled with a sense of fearlessness and an unrelenting desire to secure his family's financial future at any cost as he enters the dangerous world of drugs and crime.

items.title: Dexter
items.description: Dexter Morgan, a blood spatter pattern analyst for the Miami Metro Police also leads a secret life as a serial killer, hunting down criminals who have slipped through the cracks of justice.

items.title: The Office
items.description: The everyday lives of office employees in the Scranton, Pennsylvania branch of the fictional Dunder Mifflin Paper Company.

items.title: Criminal Minds
items.description: An elite team of FBI profilers analyze the country's most twisted criminal minds, anticipating their next moves before they strike again. The Behavioral Analysis Unit's most experienced agent is David Rossi, a founding member of the BAU who returns to help the team solve new cases.

items.title: House
items.description: Dr. Gregory House, a drug-addicted, unconventional, misanthropic medical genius, leads a team of diagnosticians at the fictional Princeton–Plainsboro Teaching Hospital in New Jersey.

items.title: Lost
items.description: Stripped of everything, the survivors of a horrific plane crash  must work together to stay alive. But the island holds many secrets.

items.title: NCIS
items.description: From murder and espionage to terrorism and stolen submarines, a team of special agents investigates any crime that has any connection to Navy and Marine Corps personnel, regardless of rank or position.

items.title: Smallville
items.description: The origins of the world’s greatest hero–from Krypton refugee Kal-el’s arrival on Earth through his tumultuous teen years to Clark Kent’s final steps toward embracing his destiny as the Man of Steel.

items.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
items.description: A Las Vegas team of forensic investigators are trained to solve criminal cases by scouring the crime scene, collecting irrefutable evidence and finding the missing pieces that solve the mystery.

items.title: Family Guy
items.description: Sick, twisted, politically incorrect and Freakin' Sweet animated series featuring the adventures of the dysfunctional Griffin family. Bumbling Peter and long-suffering Lois have three kids. Stewie (a brilliant but sadistic baby bent on killing his mother and taking over the world), Meg (the oldest, and is the most unpopular girl in town) and Chris (the middle kid, he's not very bright but has a passion for movies). The final member of the family is Brian - a talking dog and much more than a pet, he keeps Stewie in check whilst sipping Martinis and sorting through his own life issues.

items.title: The X-Files
items.description: The exploits of FBI Special Agents Fox Mulder and Dana Scully who investigate X-Files: marginalized, unsolved cases involving paranormal phenomena. Mulder believes in the existence of aliens and the paranormal while Scully, a skeptic, is assigned to make scientific analyses of Mulder's discoveries that debunk Mulder's work and thus return him to mainstream cases.

items.title: Raw
items.description: A regularly scheduled, live, year-round program featuring some of the biggest WWE Superstars.

items.title: Law & Order
items.description: In cases ripped from the headlines, police investigate serious and often deadly crimes, weighing the evidence and questioning the suspects until someone is taken into custody. The district attorney's office then builds a case to convict the perpetrator by proving the person guilty beyond a reasonable doubt. Working together, these expert teams navigate all sides of the complex criminal justice system to make New York a safer place.

items.title: The Simpsons
items.description: Set in Springfield, the average American town, the show focuses on the antics and everyday adventures of the Simpson family; Homer, Marge, Bart, Lisa and Maggie, as well as a virtual cast of thousands. Since the beginning, the series has been a pop culture icon, attracting hundreds of celebrities to guest star. The show has also made name for itself in its fearless satirical take on politics, media and American life in general.
